00012 def get_backend():
00013     """Return the current backend object (used for direct access
00014     to the underlying plotting package when there is need for
00015     advanced plotting beyond the plain easyplot functionality).
00016     """
00017     return plt._g

00047 def test_legend():
00048     x=seq(-2,2,.2)
00049     colors = 'r g b c m y k'.split()
00050     hold('on')
00051     for i in range(len(colors)):
00052         plot(x,x**i,'%s'%colors[i],legend='x^%d'%i)
00053     raw_input('press enter')

00077 def test_subplot():

00079     #xx,yy,zz = meshgrid(seq(-2,2,.2), seq(-2,2,.25), seq(-2,2,.16))
00080     x = seq(-2,2,.2)
00081     xx,yy,zz=meshgrid(x,x,x)
00082     vv = xx*exp(-xx**2-yy**2-zz**2)
00083     slice_(xx, yy, zz, vv, [-1.2,.8,2], 2, [-2,-.2], shading='interp',
00084            colormap=jet(),
00085            #xmin=-1,xmax=1,ymin=-1,ymax=1,zmin=-1,zmax=1,
00086            title='slices',
00087            #daspect=[1,1,1.5],
00088            )
00089     #raw_input('press enter')
00090 
00091     subplot(2,2,2)

00093     quiver(x,y,sin(theta)/10,cos(theta)/10,0.04,'b')
00094     hold('on'); plot(x,y,'r'); hold('off')
00095     #raw_input('press enter')

00181 def test_streamribbon():
00182     xmin = -7; xmax = 7
00183     ymin = -7; ymax = 7 
00184     zmin = -7; zmax = 7 
00185     x = linspace(xmin,xmax,30)
00186     y = linspace(ymin,ymax,20)
00187     z = linspace(zmin,zmax,20)
00188     x,y,z = meshgrid(x,y,z,sparse=False)
00189     u = y; v = -x; w = 0*x+1
00190 
00191     set(show=False)
00192     hold('on')
00193     daspect([1,1,1])
00194     #cx,cy,cz = meshgrid(linspace(xmin,xmax,30),linspace(ymin,ymax,30),[-3,4])
00195     #h2=coneplot(x,y,z,u,v,w,cx,cy,cz, 'q')
00196     #set(h2, 'color', 'k');
00197       
00198     sx,sy,sz = meshgrid([-1,0,1],[-1,0,1],[-6]*3,sparse=False)
00199     p = streamribbon(x,y,z,u,v,w,sx,sy,sz,view=3,shading='interp')
00200     sx,sy,sz = meshgrid(seq(1,6),zeros(6,Float),[-6]*6,sparse=False)
00201     p2 = streamribbon(x,y,z,u,v,w,sx,sy,sz,camproj='perspective')
00202       
00203     view(-30,10); axis('off'); axis('tight')
00204     #camproj(p);
00205     camva(66); camlookat(); camdolly(0,0,.5)#,'f')
00206     #camlight()
00207     set(show=True)
00208     show()
00209     raw_input('press enter')

00211 def test_streamtube():
00212     x = seq(-2,2,1)
00213     xx,yy,zz=meshgrid(x,x,x)
00214     vv = xx*exp(-xx**2-yy**2-zz**2)
00215     px,py,pz = gradient(vv)
00216     streamtube(xx,yy,zz,px,py,pz,[0.1]*5,[-.5,-.2,0,.1,.5],seq(-2,2,1),
00217                #zmin=-.2,zmax=.2,
00218                daspect=[1,1,1],
00219                )
00220     raw_input('press enter')

00222 def test_streamline():
00223     x = seq(-2,2,.2)
00224     xx,yy = meshgrid(x,x)
00225     zz = xx*exp(-xx**2-yy**2)
00226     px,py = gradient(zz)
00227     streamline(xx,yy,px,py,[.2,-.2],[-.5,-.5],.2,title='streamlines',hold='on')
00228     quiver(xx,yy,px,py,4)
00229     #contour(xx,yy,zz,10)
00230     raw_input('press enter')
00231     hold('off')
00232     xx,yy,zz=meshgrid(x,x,x)
00233     vv = xx*exp(-xx**2-yy**2-zz**2)
00234     px,py,pz = gradient(vv)
00235     streamline(xx,yy,zz,px,py,pz,x,x,x)
00236     raw_input('press enter')

00261 def test_slice_2():
00262     x = seq(-2,2,.1)
00263     #xx,yy,zz = meshgrid(x,x,x)
00264     xx,yy,zz = meshgrid(seq(.1,10,.2),seq(-3,3,.25),seq(-3,3,.25))
00265     #xv,yv,zv,vv = flow(xx,yy,zz)
00266     xx,yy,zz,vv = flow(xx,yy,zz)
00267 
00268     xmin = min(ravel(xx))
00269     ymin = min(ravel(yy)) 
00270     zmin = min(ravel(zz))
00271 
00272     xmax = max(ravel(xx)) 
00273     ymax = max(ravel(yy)) 
00274     zmax = max(ravel(zz))
00275 
00276     set(show=False)
00277 
00278     hslice = surf(linspace(xmin,xmax,100),
00279                   linspace(ymin,ymax,100),
00280                   zeros((100,100)))
00281     #clf()
00282 
00283     #rotate(hslice,[-1,0,0],-45)
00284     xd = hslice.get('xdata')
00285     yd = hslice.get('ydata')
00286     zd = hslice.get('zdata')
00287     #delete(hslice)
00288 
00289     h = slice_(xx,yy,zz,vv,[],[],0)#xd,yd,zd)
00290     #h = slice_(xx,yy,zz,vv,[],[],0)
00291     h.set(diffuse=.8)
00292 ##     h.set('FaceColor','interp',
00293 ##           'EdgeColor','none',
00294 ##           'DiffuseStrength',.8)
00295 
00296     hold('on')
00297     hx = slice_(xx,yy,zz,vv,xmax-0.001,[],[])
00298     #set(hx,'FaceColor','interp','EdgeColor','none')
00299 
00300     hy = slice_(xx,yy,zz,vv,[],ymax,[])
00301     #set(hy,'FaceColor','interp','EdgeColor','none')
00302 
00303     hz = slice_(xx,yy,zz,vv,[],[],zmin+0.001);
00304     #set(hz,'FaceColor','interp','EdgeColor','none')
00305 
00306     shading('interp')
00307     daspect([1,1,1])
00308     box('on')
00309     view(-38.5,16)
00310     #camzoom(1.4)
00311     camproj('perspective')
00312     set(show=True)
00313     show()
00314     raw_input('press enter')

00486     # examples taken from:
00487     # http://www.math.uic.edu/~math210/newlabs/lab7/lab7.html
00488     
00489 ##     xx,yy = meshgrid(seq(-1,1,.1),seq(-1,1,1))
00490 ##     quiver(xx,yy,-yy,xx,10)
00491 
00492 ##     zz = (xx**2+yy**2)/2

00523 def test_2Dvector():
00524     x=seq(-3,3,1)
00525     X,Y=meshgrid(x,x)
00526 ##     Z = peaks(X,Y)
00527     Z = X* exp(-X**2-Y**2)
00528 
00529     # in Matlab:
00530     # >> [u,v]=surfnorm(X,Y,exp(-X .* X) .* exp(-Y .* Y))
00531     u=array([[ 0.0000, -0.0000, -0.0001, 0,  0.0001,  0.0000, -0.0000],
00532              [ 0.0027, -0.0034, -0.0090, 0,  0.0090,  0.0034, -0.0027],
00533              [ 0.0542, -0.0675, -0.1750, 0,  0.1750,  0.0675, -0.0542],
00534              [ 0.1459, -0.1808, -0.4406, 0,  0.4406,  0.1808, -0.1459],
00535              [ 0.0542, -0.0675, -0.1750, 0,  0.1750,  0.0675, -0.0542],
00536              [ 0.0027, -0.0034, -0.0090, 0,  0.0090,  0.0034, -0.0027],
00537              [ 0.0000, -0.0000, -0.0001, 0,  0.0001,  0.0000, -0.0000]])
00538 
00539     v=array([[ 0.0000,  0.0027,  0.0542,  0.1459,  0.0542,  0.0027,  0.0000],
00540              [-0.0000, -0.0034, -0.0675, -0.1808, -0.0675, -0.0034, -0.0000],
00541              [-0.0001, -0.0090, -0.1750, -0.4406, -0.1750, -0.0090, -0.0001],
00542              [      0,       0,       0,       0,       0,       0,       0],
00543              [ 0.0001,  0.0090,  0.1750,  0.4406,  0.1750,  0.0090,  0.0001],
00544              [ 0.0000,  0.0034,  0.0675,  0.1808,  0.0675,  0.0034,  0.0000],
00545              [-0.0000, -0.0027, -0.0542, -0.1459, -0.0542, -0.0027, -0.0000]])
00546 
00547     quiver(X,Y,u,v,legend='quiver 2')
00548     hold('on')
00549     contour(X,Y,Z,5)    
00550     raw_input('press enter')

00552 def test_3Dvector():
00553     x = seq(-2,2,1)
00554     X,Y=meshgrid(x,x)
00555     Z = X*exp(-X**2-Y**2)
00556 
00557     U = array([[0.0125,   -0.0003,   -0.0067,   -0.0003,    0.0125],
00558                [0.2429,   -0.0066,   -0.1341,   -0.0066,    0.2429],
00559                [0.5628,   -0.0183,   -0.3453,   -0.0183,    0.5628],
00560                [0.2429,   -0.0066,   -0.1341,   -0.0066,    0.2429],
00561                [0.0125,   -0.0003,   -0.0067,   -0.0003,    0.0125]])
00562 
00563     V = array([[ 0.0076,   0.0764,         0,   -0.0764,   -0.0076],
00564                [ 0.0174,   0.1777,         0,   -0.1777,   -0.0174],
00565                [      0,        0,         0,         0,         0],
00566                [-0.0174,  -0.1777,         0,    0.1777,    0.0174],
00567                [-0.0076,  -0.0764,         0,    0.0764,    0.0076]])
00568 
00569     W = array([[0.9999,    0.9971,    1.0000,    0.9971,    0.9999],
00570                [0.9699,    0.9841,    0.9910,    0.9841,    0.9699],
00571                [0.8266,    0.9998,    0.9385,    0.9998,    0.8266],
00572                [0.9699,    0.9841,    0.9910,    0.9841,    0.9699],
00573                [0.9999,    0.9971,    1.0000,    0.9971,    0.9999]])
00574 
00575     quiver3(X,Y,Z,U,V,W,view=3,
00576             #daspect=[1,1,1],
00577             #view=(0,-50),
00578             legend='quiver3',
00579             )
00580     hold('on')
00581     surf(X,Y,Z)
00582     raw_input('press enter')

00584 from Numeric import pi, cos, sqrt, ones, shape, floor, transpose

00586 def matlab_test():
00587     n = 12;
00588     a = .2;                         # the diameter of the small tube
00589     c = .6;                         # the diameter of the bulb
00590     t1 = seq(pi/4, 5*pi/4, pi/n);   # parameter along the tube
00591     t2 = seq(5*pi/4, 9*pi/4, pi/n); # angle around the tube
00592     
00593     u = seq(pi/2, 5*pi/2, pi/n)
00594     X,Z1 = meshgrid(t1,u,sparse=False)
00595     Y,Z2 = meshgrid(t2,u,sparse=False)
00596 
00597     # The handle
00598     len_ = sqrt(sin(X)**2 + cos(2*X)**2);
00599     x1 = c*ones(shape(X))*(cos(X)*sin(X)
00600                            - 0.5*ones(shape(X))+a*sin(Z1)*sin(X)/len_);
00601     y1 = a*c*cos(Z1)*ones(shape(X));
00602     z1 = ones(shape(X))*cos(X) + a*c*sin(Z1)*cos(2*X)/len_;
00603     #import sys; sys.exit()
00604     handleHndl=surf(x1,y1,z1,X);
00605     #set(handleHndl,'EdgeColor',[.5 .5 .5]);
00606     hold('on');
00607 
00608     # The bulb
00609     r = sin(Y) * cos(Y) - (a + 1./2) * ones(shape(Y));
00610     x2 = c * sin(Z2) * r;
00611     y2 = - c * cos(Z2) * r;
00612     z2 = ones(shape(Y)) * cos(Y);
00613     bulbHndl=surf(x2,y2,z2,Y);
00614     #set(bulbHndl,'EdgeColor',[.5 .5 .5])
00615 
00616     colormap(hsv());
00617     #axis vis3d
00618     view(-37,30);
00619     axis('off')
00620     light(lightpos=(2,-4,5))
00621     light()
00622     #shading('interp')
00623     show()
00624     hold('off')
00625     raw_input('press enter')
00626 
00627 def matlab_test2():
00628     n = 128;
00629     u = linspace(0,pi,n);
00630     v = linspace(0,pi,n);
00631     
00632     u = u[NewAxis,:]*ones((n,1))
00633     v = v[:,NewAxis]*ones((1,n))
00634     #u = repmat(u,n,1);
00635     #v = repmat(transpose(v),1,n);
00636 
00637     x = cos(v)*sin(u);
00638     y = sin(v)*sin(u);
00639     z = cos(u);
00640     f = 1./2*((2*x**2-y**2-z**2) + 2*y*z*(y**2-z**2) + 
00641              z*x*(x**2-z**2) + x*y*(y**2-x**2));
00642     g = sqrt(3)/2 * ((y**2-z**2) + z*x*(z**2-x**2) + x*y*(y**2-x**2));
00643     h = (x+y+z)*((x+y+z)**3 + 4*(y-x)*(z-y)*(x-z));
00644 
00645     clf()
00646     s = surf(f,g,h/10,u,
00647              shading='interp',
00648              daspect=[1,1,1],
00649              colormap=jet(),
00650              view=(-40,23),
00651              axis='off')
00652     #'LineStyle','none', ...
00653     #'FaceLighting','gouraud', ...
00654     #'FaceColor','interp');
00655     
00656     #l1 = light();
00657     #l2 = light();
00658     #lightangle(l1,70,-40);
00659     #lightangle(l2,-30,80);
00660     #camzoom(1.5);
00661     raw_input('press enter')

00663 def matlab_test3():
00664     # Number of grid points in each (circular) section of the tube.
00665     m = 20;
00666     # Number of sections along the tube.
00667     n = 60;
00668     # Radius of the tube.
00669     R = 0.75;
00670     # Symmetry index.  Try q=floor(n/3) (symmetric) or q=floor(n/4)
00671     q = int(floor(n/3));
00672 
00673     # Do not change this!
00674     t = seq(0,n)/n;
00675 
00676     # The generating function f0 must be 1-periodic.
00677     # f1 and f2 are the first and second derivatives of f0.
00678     a = 2; b = 3; c = 1.5;
00679     q1=2; q2=4;
00680     f0 = sin(q1*pi*t) + a*sin(q2*pi*t) - \
00681          b*cos(4*pi*t)/2 + c*sin(6*pi*t);
00682     f1 = (q1*pi)*cos(q1*pi*t) + a*(q2*pi)*cos(q2*pi*t) + \
00683          b*(4*pi)*sin(4*pi*t)/2 + c*(6*pi)*cos(6*pi*t);
00684     f2 = -(q1*pi)**2*sin(q1*pi*t) - a*(q2*pi)**2*sin(q2*pi*t) + \
00685          b*(4*pi)**2*cos(4*pi*t)/2 - c*(6*pi)**2*sin(6*pi*t);
00686 
00687     # Extend f periodically to 2 period-intervals:
00688     #f0 = [ f0(1:n) f0(1:n) ];
00689     f0 = ravel(array([f0[0:n],f0[0:n]], Float))
00690     #f1 = [ f1(1:n) f1(1:n) ];
00691     f1 = ravel(array([f1[0:n],f1[0:n]], Float))
00692     #f2 = [ f2(1:n) f2(1:n) ];
00693     f2 = ravel(array([f2[0:n],f2[0:n]], Float))
00694 
00695     # [x10;x20;x30] is the parametric representation of
00696     # the center-line of the tube:
00697     x10 = f0[0:n+1] #f0(1:n+1);
00698     x20 = f0[q:q+n+1];
00699     x30 = f0[2*q:2*q+n+1];
00700 
00701     # [x11;x21;x31] is velocity (same as tangent) vector:
00702     x11 = f1[0:n+1];
00703     x21 = f1[q:q+n+1];
00704     x31 = f1[2*q:2*q+n+1];
00705 
00706     # [x12;x22;x32] is acceleration vector:
00707     x12 = f2[0:n+1];
00708     x22 = f2[q:q+n+1];
00709     x32 = f2[2*q:2*q+n+1];
00710 
00711     speed = sqrt(x11**2 + x21**2 + x31**2);
00712 
00713     # This is the dot-product of the velocity and acceleration vectors:
00714     velacc = x11*x12 + x21*x22 + x31*x32;
00715 
00716     # Here is the normal vector:
00717     nrml1 = speed**2 * x12 - velacc*x11;
00718     nrml2 = speed**2 * x22 - velacc*x21;
00719     nrml3 = speed**2 * x32 - velacc*x31;
00720     normallength = sqrt(nrml1**2 + nrml2**2 + nrml3**2);
00721 
00722     # And here is the normalized normal vector:
00723     unitnormal1 = nrml1 / normallength;
00724     unitnormal2 = nrml2 / normallength;
00725     unitnormal3 = nrml3 / normallength;
00726 
00727     # And the binormal vector ( B = T x N )
00728     binormal1 = (x21*unitnormal3 - x31*unitnormal2) / speed;
00729     binormal2 = (x31*unitnormal1 - x11*unitnormal3) / speed;
00730     binormal3 = (x11*unitnormal2 - x21*unitnormal1) / speed;
00731 
00732     # s is the coordinate along the circular cross-sections of the tube:
00733     s = seq(0,m)[:,NewAxis];
00734     s = (2*pi/m)*s;
00735 
00736     # Each of x1, x2, x3 is an (m+1)x(n+1) matrix.
00737     # Rows represent coordinates along the tube.  Columns represent coordinates
00738     # in each (circular) cross-section of the tube.
00739 
00740     xa1 = ones((m+1,1))*x10;
00741     xb1 = (cos(s)*unitnormal1 + sin(s)*binormal1);
00742     xa2 = ones((m+1,1))*x20;
00743     xb2 = (cos(s)*unitnormal2 + sin(s)*binormal2);
00744     xa3 = ones((m+1,1))*x30;
00745     xb3 = (cos(s)*unitnormal3 + sin(s)*binormal3);
00746     color = ones((m+1,1))*(seq(0,n)*2/n-1);
00747 
00748     x1 = xa1 + R*xb1;
00749     x2 = xa2 + R*xb2;
00750     x3 = xa3 + R*xb3;
00751 
00752     clf()
00753     surf(x1,x2,x3,color);
00754     shading('interp');
00755     light()
00756     #lighting gouraud % 'lighting phong' will use zbuffer, slower
00757     view(2)
00758     #axis equal off
00759     axis('off')
00760     show()
00761     #axis vis3d % for smooth rotate3d
00762     raw_input('press enter')
00763     #import time
00764     #time.sleep(5)
00765 
00766 def test_quiver():
00767     x = seq(-3,3,.2);
00768     y = seq(-3,3,.2);
00769     clf()
00770     xx,yy = meshgrid(x,y);
00771     zz = peaks(xx,yy);
00772     hold('on')
00773     #pcolor(x,y,zz);
00774     axis([-3, 3, -3, 3]);
00775     #colormap((jet+white)/2);
00776     shading('interp')
00777     px,py = gradient(zz,.2,.2);
00778     quiver(x,y,px,py,5,'k');
00779     axis('off')
00780     hold('off')
00781     raw_input('press enter')

00783 def test_quiver3():
00784     # http://www.monolith.uwaterloo.ca/software/matlab/HTML/help/techdoc/creating_plots/chspec24.html
00785     vz = 10  # Velocity
00786     a = -32  # Acceleration
00787     t = seq(0,1,.1)
00788     z = vz*t + 1./2*a*t**2
00789     vx = 2
00790     x = vx*t
00791     vy = 3
00792     y = vy*t
00793     u = gradient(x)
00794     v = gradient(y)
00795     w = gradient(z)
00796     scale = 0
00797     quiver3(x,y,z,u,v,w,scale,
00798             view=[70,18],
00799             grid='on',
00800             xmin=0,xmax=3.5,ymin=0,ymax=3,zmin=-10,zmax=2)
00801     raw_input('press enter')
00802     
00803     x = seq(-3,3,1)
00804     xx,yy,zz = meshgrid(x,x,x,sparse=False)
00805     quiver3(xx,yy,zz,xx,yy,zz,'r',
00806             view=3,
00807             axis=[-5,5,-5,5,-5,5],
00808             daspect=[1,1,1],
00809             grid='on')
00810     raw_input('press enter')

00812 def test_figure():
00813     import pprint
00814     x=seq(-2,2,.1)
00815     plot(x**2)
00816     f1=gcf()
00817     print pprint.pformat(f1.__dict__['_prop'])
00818     #print pprint.pformat(plt.__dict__)
00819     raw_input('press enter')
00820     figure()
00821     #subplot(1,2,1)
00822     plot(x,x**3,'r')
00823     f2 = gcf()
00824     print pprint.pformat(f2.__dict__['_prop'])
00825     print f1.get('axes') == f2.get('axes')
00826     #print pprint.pformat(plt.__dict__)
00827     raw_input('press enter')

00855 def test_pcolor():

00857     r = seq(0,n,1)[:,NewAxis]/n;
00858     theta = pi*seq(-n,n)/n;
00859     X = r*cos(theta);
00860     Y = r*sin(theta);
00861     C = r*cos(2*theta);
00862     pcolor(X,Y,C,axis='image')
